description: This file sets up a Telegram agent using the agno framework, configuring it with a bot token and chat ID, and sends a message to the Telegram chat.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using various tools.

classes.name: TelegramTools
classes.description: A tool for interacting with Telegram via a bot.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to send a message or response via the agent.
